snippet: Videos captured the roughly two-minute struggle on Saturday between protesters and two lieutenants who were injured.
abstract: New York City detectives are seeking six additional suspects who participated in melee on Brooklyn Bridge in which two lieutenants were attacked and injured; two-minute struggle between protester and Lieutenants Philip Chan and Patrick Sullivan was caught on video; Police Commissioner William J Bratton says any assaults on NYPD officers are intolerable and will bring appropriate response.

byline.contributor: Nate Schweber and John Surico contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Videos captured the roughly two-minute struggle on Saturday between protesters and two lieutenants who were injured.

headline.main: Police Hunt for 6 in Brooklyn Bridge Protest Melee
headline.print_headline: Police Hunt for 6 in Brooklyn Bridge Melee

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Sullivan, Patrick (New York, NY, Police Officer)
